string.text: This is the Encyclopedia. Information will automatically be added to its pages, and flagged on your HUD, as you progress through the Zone\n(Sorted by topic)
About the Encyclopedia
Factory bandit's PDA
Trader: Make your way south to the Army outpost, and get me the officer's document case. It contains information on the Military's recent expedition to the northern part of the Zone
Dead rookie's PDA

Fanatic: Help us defend the camp against those Mercs who ordered our Rookies out of here... Here's the plan - Everyone hide, so the camp looks deserted. Wait for the Mercs to enter the camp, and then attack on the Captain's signal...
Guide's PDA
Meeting the Doctor
Doctor: I'll be waiting for the man who arrives at the secret hiding place used by Strelok and his men. If he knows where to look, then he's the man we're looking for...
Okay, I'll meet with Ghost's man. I'll be waiting for him at Strelok's hiding place. If he's one of us, he'll know where to find me...

Some guys working for Sidorovich were expected back from an assignment up north, but their patrol disappeared somewhere near Cordon.\nOne of them, Nimble, was carrying a flash drive with important information. Sid needs this desperately, so we have to find the flash drive and get it to him.\nHe thinks that Wolf, the veteran Stalker in the Rookie camp, might know the whereabouts of the missing patrol. If I can take some pressure off Wolf, he might help me out with a weapon and some gear...
Seriy to Fox: A friend wants me to offer my help to a bunch of Stalkers who dug out Strelok's stash, so I'm off to the hangar at the Garbage with my boys. I'll wait for you there
Yesterday one of our brothers went to scout the deserted mill, and we haven't heard from him since. We need to go there and find out what's happened to him...

Wolf: Bring back the stolen dynamite from the Bandits' factory. Meet up with some of our scouts under the bridge.\nYou'll need to say "Hello from the Underworld" - that's the password.\nThey're reliable men. If you lead them properly, they'll lay down their lives for you...
Wolf: Clear out the Bandits at the factory, with the help of my scouts near the bridge. Then report back to me. Oh, and look after them...
Dead Stalker's PDA

Damn it, I can't remember anything! All I have is a PDA with a picture of a guy I don't know, and I've never seen before.\nIt's a terrible picture, and his face is covered. I don't know why, but I need to find him.\nThere's just one message in the PDA - 'Kill Strelok'...

Sidorovich has just sent us a message! Apparently a Stalker named Fox has come back from a raid up north, but got into serious trouble.\nSid didn't exactly know what Fox's problem was, but he screamed something about some vicious mutants after him.\nQuick! Go to the burned down house on the road, north of the bridge, and help him out. He might know something about this 'Strelok'...
Fox wants us to meet up with his brother, Seriy, who's living in the hanger in the Garbage area. Seriy knows more about Strelok, so Fox thinks I should have a chat with him while he's still there...

Sidorovich wants us to travel north towards the Garbage, and follow the road west towards the Agroprom Research Institute.
There's a Military encampment in this area, and rumours say that there's a case full of important documents that hasn't yet been looted.
Get to the Agroprom vicinity as fast as possible, and find a way inside the Military HQ to locate the documents.
As soon as you have the case, take it to the Barkeep who runs the 100 Rads Bar in the former Rostok area
Fox's PDA

Tolik's Diary: The trader sent us to spy on the Military in the Agroprom Research Institute. When we got there we took no chances and killed everyone, Bandits and Military alike. We spent some time there and dug out some interesting stuff. I'm encoding the rest...\n(There follows a page of gibberish that may be a code of some sort...)
Seriy to Fox: A guy asked me to meet a group of Stalkers who've sniffed out Strelok's hiding place. I'll be at the Garbage for a while, so come over if you want...
Tolik's PDA
Trader: There's a Whirligig anomaly close by with an artefact right in its centre. Can you retrieve it for me?
There's an unusual anomaly here. Looks like it's moving. I hope I can work out its movement patterns, because I certainly don't have the cash those soldiers are asking for passage...
I left a small cache at the deserted farm. There's some food and ammo inside, but I'm too weak to carry it... I don't know if I'll even make it to the camp...
